p.d: Victoire, primary school teacher, moves to a small village with husband Samuel and their two children. As the new school year begins she meets Florent Malléval, her first love, dropping his daughter off. Their feelings are immediately rekindled. As they prepare to leave their respective partners, Florent's wife mysteriously disappears... Directed by: Lionel Bailliu (France, 2019) Screenplay: Lionel Bailliu, Yann Le Gall Cast: Julie Gayet (Victoire Delorme), Bruno Debrandt (Florent Malléval), Thomas Jouannet (Samuel Delorme), Marie Dompnier (Marion Malléval), Joyce Bibring (Alexandra), Sylvie Granotier (Anne), Alain Doutey (Pierre), Cyrielle Voguet (Émilie), Anne Décis (Ms Carlier), Lucie Fruttero (Léa), Maxime Delacolonge (Hugo), Max Libert (Mathieu) Genre: detective
